title: Integrated Practice Blended Mathematics e-Learning Course: Manufacturing Field Simulation-Based

context.prior_knowledge: Mastery of foundational math concepts (quadratic equations, functions, statistics)
context.additional_context: VR simulations of manufacturing case studies (milling, turning processes) optimized for smartphone-based access.

learning_goals: Learners can convert manufacturing process data into mathematical models and apply them to VR simulations.
Learners can present solutions to process optimization problems by utilizing trigonometric functions and differentiation concepts.
Learners can analyze workplace safety standard data as probability distributions to build risk-prediction models.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
